alert.note: Alert for Kings (Brooklyn); Richmond (Staten Is.) (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued August 29 at 4:17PM EDT until August 29 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Richmond (Staten Island) and Kings (Brooklyn) Counties. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding of the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. GREAT KILLS HARBOR AT GREAT KILLS NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 7.2 FT, MODERATE 8.2 FT, MAJOR 9.2 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.8 FT, MODERATE 2.8 FT, MAJOR 3.8 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 29/07 AM 6.0/ 6.5 0.6/ 1.1 0.8/ 1.3 1 NONE 29/07 PM 7.0/ 7.5 1.6/ 2.0 0.7/ 1.1 1 MINOR 30/08 AM 6.2/ 6.8 0.9/ 1.4 0.7/ 1.1 1 NONE 30/08 PM 7.1/ 7.6 1.7/ 2.2 0.6/ 1.1 1 MINOR 31/09 AM 6.6/ 7.1 1.2/ 1.7 0.6/ 1.1 1 NONE 31/09 PM 7.2/ 7.7 1.8/ 2.2 0.7/ 1.1 1 MINOR KILL VAN KULL AT BERGEN POINT NY MLLW CATEGORIES -
